description.p: COSMIC Camera is a third-party camera application for the COSMICâ„¢ desktop environment. Whether you need to snap a quick photo, record a video, or scan a QR code, COSMIC Camera provides a clean and intuitive interface that stays out of your way.

Just open the app and start capturing moments. Add fun filters to your photos, scan QR codes to open links or connect to WiFi, or use virtual camera mode to look great in video calls with your favorite filter applied.

ul.li: Photo and video capture: high quality and hardware accelerated
QR code scanner: open links, connect to WiFi, and more
15 creative filters: Mono, Sepia, Vivid, Noir, Pencil Sketch, and more
Virtual camera: use your filtered camera feed in video calls and other apps
Theatre mode: fullscreen, distraction-free preview
Multi-camera support: easily switch between cameras and microphones
